name: Solitaire - Wild Park
description:
Welcome to Solitaire - Wild Park! Combining the classic card game (also known as Patience or Klondike) with an enchanting zoo simulation, this relaxing solitaire game provides you with the chance to manage your own zoo. Create your dream zoo by playing this BRAND-NEW & CREATIVE solitaire game!

Highlights

- UNIQUE MANAGEMENT SIMULATION
Solitaire - Wild Park is a zoo simulator based on the classic solitaire card game. Make a lovely home for animals and collect food to feed them. Try your best to build the best zoo ever!

- ADORABLE ANIMALS & DIVERSE HABITATS
You can become a zoo tycoon by collecting dozens of cute animals including zoo favorites like pandas, rhinos, koalas, kangaroos, lions, elephants, giraffes, hippos, antelopes, polar bears, and penguins! Build spacious enclosures and refurbish your zoo with unique decorations from around the world!

- EXCITING CHALLENGES AND EVENTS
Apart from classic solitaire games, daily challenges and dozens of other interesting mini-games await you. There are special events always around the corner that help you escape boredom. Download now and play anytime, anywhere!


How to play

- Up to 10 game records
- Draw 1 card or 3 cards
- Standard or Vegas Casino scoring
- Single tap or drag & drop to move cards
- Daily challenges with different levels
- Auto-collect cards after completion
- Feature to Undo moves
- Feature to use Hints
- Timer mode available
- Left-handed mode available
- Offline game! No Wi-Fi required


If you’re a fan of Patience or Klondike solitaire games, never miss Solitaire - Wild Park! Design your zoo however you like and make it a paradise for all animals. Ready for a wild ride? Off we go!
